resources.string:
specifications:

 Processor: Up to 10th Gen Intel® Core™ i7 
 Operating System: Windows 10 Home
 Graphics :NVIDIA® GTX1650 graphics
 Display:15.6" FHD (1920 x 1080) IPS, 300 nits, sRGB 100%, Dolby Vision™ HDR, optional glass display
 Memory:
 Up to 16GB Battery : 1080p Video Playback: Up to 16 hours
 MobileMark® 2014: Average 13 hours1 Rapid Charge2
 1All battery life claims are approximate and based on results using the MobileMark® 2014 battery life benchmark test. Actual battery life will vary and depends on many factors such as product configuration and usage, software use, wireless functionality, power management settings, and screen brightness. The maximum capacity of the battery will decrease with time and use. 2Rapid Charge: Charge 15 minutes in standby mode or while powered off, for up to 3 hours of use based on test results using the MobileMark® 2014 ver. 1.5 battery life benchmark test. Storage : Up to 1TB PCIe SSD
 Audio :Front-facing Dolby Atmos® Speaker System (above keyboard) 2x D-cover speakers
 Camera: IR camera Dimensions (H x W x D) Starting at 355.5mm x 230mm x 15.9mm - 17.2mm / 14" x 9.05" x 0.63" - 0.68"
 Weight: Starting at 1.8kg / 4lbs
 Connectivity:WiFi 6 (2x2 802.11 ax) Ports / Slots 2 x USB-A 3.2 Gen 1 USB-C (Thunderbolt 3.0 + USB 2.3 Gen 2 + DisplayPort™ 1.4b + PD 3.0) SD card reader HDMI Power input Headphone / mic combo Keyboard: Backlit
 Color: Dark Moss

specifications:

 Processor: Up to 11th Gen Intel® Core™ i7
 Operating System: Windows 10 Home
 Display: 13.3" QHD (2560 x 1600) with Dolby Vision™, 300 nits, 72% NTSC, 100% sRGB, TÜV Rheinland-certified for eye protection
 Memory: Up to 16GB LPDDR4X dual channel
 Storage: Up to 1TB M.2 PCIe SSD
 Graphics: Intel® Iris® Xe
 Battery: All-day battery life
 Rapid-charging: available with 65W adapter
 Audio: 2 x 2W Harman Kardon® speakers, optimized with Dolby Atmos® 2 x digital mics
 Dimensions: (H x W x D)13.9mm-14.9mm x 296.9mm x 208.55mm / 0.5"-0.58" x 11.7" x 8.2"
 Weight: Less than 1kg / 2.2lbs
 Color: Moon White
 Connectivity: Intel® 2x2 802.11ax WiFi 6
 Bluetooth®: 5.0
 Ports / Slots: USB 3.0 Gen 1 (Type-C), 2 x USB-C Thunderbolt™ 4 (1 x DisplayPort / power delivery), Headphone / mic combo, USB port transfer speeds are approximate and depend on many factors, such as processing capability of host/peripheral devices, file attributes, system configuration and operating environments; actual speeds will vary and may be less than expected.
 Camera: Infrared (IR)
 Power Supply: Unit65W, supports rapid charging
 Digital Assistants: Alexa (available in select regions), Cortana
 Keyboard: Full-sized,Backlit

specifications:

 Processor: Up to 11th Gen Intel® Core™ i7
 Operating System: Windows 10 Pro, Lenovo recommends Windows 10 Pro for business
 Display 13.3" 16:10 WQXGA (2560 × 1600) Touch IPS, antiglare, 400 nits, 100% sRGB, Corning® Gorilla® Glass, TÜV Rheinland Low Blue Light-certified, with Dolby Vision™, 13.3" 16:10 WQXGA (2560 × 1600) IPS, antiglare, 400 nits, 100% sRGB, Corning® Gorilla® Glass, TÜV Rheinland Low Blue Light-certified, with Dolby Vision™
 Memory: Up to 16GB dual-channel LPDDR4x (soldered)
 Battery: Up to 12.5 hours 53Wh (MM2018)
 Rapid Charge: supported with included 65W adapter
 *All battery life claims are approximate and based on results using the MobileMark® 2018 battery-life benchmark tests. Actual battery life will vary and depends on many factors such as product configuration and usage, software use, wireless functionality, power management settings, and screen brightness. The maximum capacity of the battery will decrease with time and use. Storage: Up to 1TB M.2 PCIe Gen 4 SSD
 Graphics: Integrated Intel® Iris® Xe
 Security: Discrete Trusted Platform Module (dTPM) 2.0
 Smart Power: On match-on-host fingerprint reader integrated with power button
 Webcam: privacy shutter
 Self-healing BIOS
 Audio: 2 x 2W Harman Kardon® speakers with Dolby Atmos®, 4 x noise-cancelling microphones (360° near-field)
 Camera: 720p HD with webcam privacy shutter
 Dimensions: (H x W x D)12.9mm x 298mm x 209mm / 0.50" x 11.73" x 8.22"
 Weight: Starting at 1.13kg / 2.49lbs
 Color: Dual-tone Storm Gray with all-aluminum top cover, Dual-tone Cloud Gray with all-aluminum top cover
 Connectivity: WiFi 6, Bluetooth® 5.2
 Ports / Slots: 2 x USB-C Thunderbolt™ 4, Headphone / mic combo, USB port transfer speeds are approximate and depend on many factors, such as processing capability of host/peripheral devices, file attributes, system configuration and operating environments; actual speeds will vary and may be less than expected.
 Keyboard: Full-size backlit keyboard,One-piece precision TouchPad, Call-control keys
 Power Supply Unit (PSU): USB-C 65W Slim Adapter, Optional USB-C 65W Wall Mount Adapter, Supports Rapid Charge
 Preloaded Software: Lenovo Vantage, AI Meeting Manager,McAfee® LiveSafe™ (trial), Office 365 (trial)

Specifications: 

 Processor: Up to AMD Ryzen™ 9 5900H Operating System: Up to Windows 10 Pro Graphics: NVIDIA ® GeForce RTX™ 3080 Laptop GPU 16GB GDDR6, Listed Boost Clock 1545MHz, Achieved Boost Clock 1710MHz, Maximum Graphics Power 165W, NVIDIA ® GeForce RTX™ 3070 Laptop GPU 8GB GDDR6, Listed Boost Clock 1560MHz, Achieved Boost Clock 1620MHz, Maximum Graphics Power 140W, NVIDIA ® GeForce RTX™ 3060 Laptop GPU 6GB GDDR6, Listed Boost Clock 1425MHz, Achieved Boost Clock 1702MHz, Maximum Graphics Power 130W
 Display: 16" QHD (2560 x 1600) IPS, 16:10, 165Hz, 3ms response time, 100% sRGB, up to VESA DIsplayHDR™ 400 certified, Dolby Vision™-enabled, NVIDIA ® G-SYNC™ support, 500 nits
 Memory: Up to 32GB
 Battery: Up to 8 hours* (MM18)
 Rapid Charge Express
 * All battery life claims are approximate and based on results using the MobileMark ® 2018 v1.0.2.46 battery life benchmark test. Actual battery life will vary and depends on many factors such as product configuration and usage, software use, wireless functionality, power management settings, and screen brightness. The maximum capacity of the battery will decrease with time and use. Storage: Up to 2TB M.2 NVMe PCIe SSD
 Audio: 2 x 2W Harman speakers with Nahimic Audio
 Camera: 720p with E-Shutter
 Dimensions: (W x D x H)20.1-23.5mm x 356mm x 261.04mm / 0.79-0.93" x 14.01" x 10.27"
 Weight: Starting at 2.5kg / 5.5lbs
 Color: Storm Grey
 Connectivity: Killer™ WiFi AX1650 (2x2) (optional), 2x2 WiFi 802.11ax, Bluetooth ® 5.1
 Ports / SlotsLeft: USB Type-C (USB 3.2 Gen 2, DisplayPort™ 1.4)
 Headphone / mic jack: Right USB Type-C (USB 3.2 Gen 1), E-Shutter button, Rear 3 x USB-A 3.2 Gen 1 (always on 5V), USB Type-C (USB 3.2 Gen 2, DisplayPort™ 1.4, power delivery), HDMI 2.1, RJ45.
 Power in: USB port transfer speeds are approximate and depend on many factors, such as processing capability of host/peripheral devices, file attributes, system configuration and operating environments; actual speeds will vary and may be less than expected. Keyboard: Corsair ® iCUE RGB Power Supply Unit: (PSU)300W Slim Adapter Preloaded Software: Lenovo Vantage, Corsair ® iCue RGB Application, Pantone X-Rite Color Management System, Nahimic Audio for Gamers, Tobii Horizon

Specifications:

 Processor: AMD Ryzen™ 7 4800H mobile processor, AMD Ryzen™ 5 4800H mobile processor
 Operating System: Windows 10 Pro
 Memory: Up to 32GB DDR4 3200MHz
 Display: 15.6″ FHD (1920 x 1080) IPS, 120Hz, 45% NTSC, 250 nits,15.6″ FHD (1920 x 1080) IPS, 60Hz, 45% NTSC, 250 nits
 Battery: Up to 6.7 hours, with Rapid Charge*
 *All battery life claims are approximate and based on results using the MobileMark® 2018 v1.0.2.46 battery life benchmark test. Actual battery life will vary and depends on many factors such as product configuration and usage, software use, wireless functionality, power management settings, and screen brightness. The maximum capacity of the battery will decrease with time and use.
 Storage: M.2 PCIe SSD: Up to 1TB, 2.5" SATA HDD 5400 RPM: 1TB, Optional SSD + HDD hybrid storage
 Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1650 Ti; 4GB, NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1650; 4GB
 Audio: 2 x 1.5W speakers with Dolby Audio™
 Webcam , microphone array
 Camera: 720 HD webcam with privacy shutter
 Dimensions: (W x D x H) Starting at 359mm x 249.6mm x 24.9mm / 14.13" x 9.83" x .98"
 Weight: Starting at 2.2kg / 4.8lbs
 Color: Chameleon Blue, Onyx Black
 Connectivity: WiFi 802.11 ac, Bluetooth® 5.1
 Ports/Slots: 2 x USB-A 3.1 Gen 1, USB-C 3.1, HDMI 2.0, RJ45,Headphone / mic combo
 Keyboard: Blue backlit gaming keyboard
 AC Adapter: 135W Adapter, Preloaded Software: Lenovo Antivirus Plus, Lenovo PC Manager, Lenovo Utility, LinkedIn, McAfee LiveSafe™, Microsoft Office

Specifications:

 Processor: Intel® Celeron® N3450, Intel Celeron N4100
 Operating System: Chrome OS™
 Display: 11.6” HD (1366 x 768) 10-point multitouch
 Graphics: Intel® Integrated Graphics
 Battery: Up to 10 hrs with 42 Whr battery
 Camera: 720p HD front-facing, 5MP HD world-facing
 Memory: 4 GB, 8 GB
 Storage: 32 GB eMMc, 64 GB eMMc
 Ports: 2 USB-C,2 USB 3.0, Micro SD card reader, Audio combo jack
 Connectivity: 802.11 AC 2 x 2 WiFi, Bluetooth® 4.2
 Dimensions: (W x H x D) 290 x 204 x 20.35 mm / 11.41" x 8.03" x 0.8"
 Weight: 1.35kg / 2.97lbs
